Tool

NameLeast Cost Path
ID4
AuthorVictor Olaya (c) 2004
Specificationgrid, interactive

Description

Creates a least cost past profile using an accumulated cost surface.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Accumulated cost Grid (input)DEM
Values (*)Grid list (optional input)VALUES
Output
Profile PointsShapes (output)POINTS
Profile LineShapes (output)LINE
